name: Meat Shooter
description:
MEAT SHOOTER just a top down shooter game for practice and study.

My main focus was the sound and visual feedbacks but i couldn't make a good enough song...I recommend playing with some animated House or Electronics for better immersion >:)

[A] [W] [S] [D] or [←] [↑] [↓] [→] to move

[RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON] to shoot

[MOUSE MOVE] to aim

by: Nicolas Schüssler

note: in the future will be posted a dev vlog about the development
